page.title: 20Farleigh Flower Festival
page.content: Each spring the people of Farleigh hold a flower festival at St. Mary's Church. The people from the area are invited to show the pride of their garden collection on this particular weekend. The festival is advertised in the surrounding areas in an effort to bring this tiny community to the attention of the outside world. Refreshments, including strawberry cream teas are available at a nominal cost. This festival is held to coincide with the supposed visit of the Virgin Mary. Information on this festival could be obtained by contacting the Rector of the Parish of Chelsham and Farleigh.
